titles.title: Tribal Nutrition Program Administration Act of 2023
Tribal Nutrition Program Administration Act of 2023
A bill to amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to improve access to the food distribution program on Indian reservations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
Tribal Nutrition Program Administration Act of 2023
This bill requires the Department of Agriculture to pay 100% of the administrative and distribution costs of the Food Distribution Program on Indian Reservations.
